subject: [Reform] I'll Translate it and post on this forum,I hope moderator don't prohibit.
body:
He calls them "Recollections of a Long Life".
GetVer 0000E82C 73 69 6F 6E 00 00 6B 00 sion.
The Pattern seemed to be glowing more brightly just 
then, as it often does immediately after being traversed.
Do you feel lucky Or do you feel scared Take what 
luck brings And be Devil may care But you're down on your luck And what will the 
next day bring.
Thereafter, you will conduct tours every three 
hours with regard to auto-combustion.
He checked the kitchen and the bath.
Then, from far away, came the sound of the front 
door bell.
I thought they were two changes in the same 
protein, which chemically compensated each other.
He gains physical strength and becomes master of 
yoga, free from all dangers.
He wasn't one hun- Turcotte moved swiftly, not 
worried right now about the dred percent certain that Mickell would back him 
up.
